name: Societal Reconstruction
description:
NO AUDIO CURRENTLY

Societal Reconstruction is a simulation intended for people that have interest in nature or simulator games and is based in a fictional time; where humans have created robots to nurture trees in order to create a supply of oxygen and wood.

The robots are located within a human-made dome with UV lights to assist tree growth, in this simulation you will be viewing the robots going from task to task, each task they complete will drop their power supplies charge, once they get too low they’ll immediately go to a charging station to recharge.

What I use to run this game can be said as a recommended hardware:

I5-8600 CPU

NVIDIA GTX 1050 3gb Graphics card At least 500mb of hard drive space

8gb ram
